title: Nightmare Luffy with Current Haki Would Be Unstoppable
theory: Fans theorize that if current Luffy could somehow access the Nightmare Luffy transformation with his mastered Haki abilities (Conqueror's Haki coating, Advanced Armament, Future Sight), he would be nearly unstoppable. The theory suggests combining 100 shadows' worth of skills with Luffy's current combat mastery would create an incredibly powerful form.
author: Multiple fans across Reddit and forums
evidenceFor: Nightmare Luffy's base power was already enough to match Oars
100 shadows would now include fighters with Haki abilities
Luffy's current willpower is even stronger than during Thriller Bark
evidenceAgainst: Oda has never brought back this transformation
The 10-minute time limit would still apply
Would make Luffy too overpowered for narrative purposes

title: Gear 4th Incorporates Elements of Nightmare Luffy
theory: Some fans theorize that Gear 4th's design and mechanics were partially inspired by the Nightmare Luffy transformation. They point to similarities: both increase Luffy's size and muscle mass, both have time limits, both combine multiple fighting styles/powers, and both change Luffy's appearance dramatically.
author: One Piece theorists
evidenceFor: Both transformations increase size and muscle mass
Both have time limits before Luffy returns to normal
Both represent Luffy pushing beyond his normal limits
evidenceAgainst: Gear 4th was developed during timeskip training, not based on Thriller Bark

title: Nightmare Luffy Could Return with Bigger Shadow Collection
theory: Some fans speculate that Nightmare Luffy could theoretically return if Luffy encountered another situation where shadows were available. They theorize: 'Imagine how strong he would be currently if he somehow managed to get his hands on maybe 10,000 shadows' or 'Imagine Nightmare Luffy Uses Gear 5'.
author: Multiple fans
evidenceFor: The technique worked once and could theoretically work again
There could be other Devil Fruit users with shadow manipulation abilities
Luffy's willpower has only increased since Thriller Bark
evidenceAgainst: Gecko Moria is the only known Kage Kage no Mi user
Would diminish the uniqueness of the Thriller Bark moment
Luffy has developed his own power-ups (Gears) that serve this purpose

title: The 100 Shadows Included Notable Pirates
theory: Fans theorize about whose shadows were among the 100 implanted into Luffy. Some speculate that the Rolling Pirates must have collected shadows from strong pirates over three years, possibly including notable fighters or even Devil Fruit users, which contributed to Nightmare Luffy's overwhelming power.
author: Fan community
evidenceFor: Nightmare Luffy demonstrated various combat skills
Rolling Pirates had three years to collect shadows
Moria targets strong pirates for their shadows
evidenceAgainst: Most strong pirates would have escaped Thriller Bark or defeated Moria
The manga/anime focuses on the quantity (100) rather than quality
